name: Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer
summary: Ghoul Grind: Night of the Necromancer is an auto-scrolling action platformer playable right on your very own NES! Play as deft duo Nox Francisca and Veronica Mimieux. Grind your way through the eerie town of St. Crypton, send the awakened townsfolk back to their slumber, and stop your necromancing best friend Vlad Drachovi before midnight strikes on All Hallows
